version_description:
- Overwhelming interactive onboarding.
- Stunning bugfixes.

- Overwhelming interactive onboarding.
- Stunning bugfixes.

This is a biggest update since the first launch!

Measuring Tape is totally rebuilt for better stability and performance. New features and interactive onboarding are all ready to be on your phone!
(Whoo-hoo!)
This time Measuring Tape team worked hard to fix all of the bugs, crashes and make the app even more enjoyable by our beloved users. :)

Woo-hoo!

Interactive onboarding added. Update the app and take a look :)
